Address: 21 Yellow Robin Circuit Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
WHAT DREAMS ARE MADE OF
CRANBOURNE EAST: Set on a block of approximately 375 SQMS is this massive opportunity to secure the best home in the best street in Cranbourne East. Its location is second to none and the amenities around this home is a purchasers delight. Schools, play grounds, sports fields, shopping, etc you wouldn't fall short of any.
With a lovely facade up the front and well cared for front yard, you will be mesmerized the moment you step into this home. The grand entrance leads you along a walkway with the master bedroom located to the left of the home which comes with a FES and a WIR.
As you progress through the walkway you are then greeted by this amazing open plan kitchen, dining and family living area. The kitchen is so modern its a chef's delight, with plenty of counter top space, Caesar stone bench tops, a lot of storage, quality appliances, free standing oven, range hood, dishwasher, large fridge cavity with plumbing connected.
The open plan dining and family living area is spacious and overlooks the kitchen which is so ideal when entertaining. The remaining two robed bedrooms are situated to the left of the home alongside the master bedroom and well-serviced by the family shower and toilet.
If entertaining is your forte then the attached alfresco with access from the living zone is a must see. With mature plants, an awesome water feature and deck lights, its just such a tranquil setting to come to after a tiring day.
All of this and a lot more on 375 SQMS, you will surely be spoilt for choice
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT PRIVATE INSPECTIONS***
At Ray White Cranbourne, our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favorable conditions.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
DISCLAIMERS:
Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, however it does not constitute any representation by the vendor, agent or agency.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.
ADDED INTERNAL/EXTERNAL FEATURES INCLUDE:
- Built 2016
- Open Plan Dining/Living
- Master FES/WIR
- Freestanding Oven
- Built-in pantry
- Range hood
- Dishwasher

- Tiled splashback
- Ducted Heating
- Split Air Conditioner - 6.9KW
- Ceiling Fans x 3
- Laundry Room
- High Ceilings

- Solar Hot Water
- Security Cameras
- Security Alarm
- Plantation Shutters
- Alfresco
- Water Feature-
- Veggie Patch
- Garden Shed

- Colorbond Fencing
- Remote controlled DLUG

Description:
Spacious family entertainer
Nestled in the heart of Cascades On Clyde, this wonderful family home is sure to impress. Stylish, spacious dimensions and a spectacular outdoor entertainment area combine in creating this this quality family home on a large 578sqm block.
- Open floor plan with multiple living areas
- Massive feature alfresco entertainment area
- Features including raised ceilings, rear roller door access, plantation shutters, ducted heating and air condition and more
Fulfill the family dream of living a quiet, well-connected lifestyle that is big on entertaining and enjoyment, with this modern home that has premium schools and Selandra Rise Shopping Precinct, public transport, parks and playgrounds all within walking distance.

Address: Lot 702/230S Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
13.6m FRONTAGE - CLYDE SPRINGS
Build your dream home with absolute confidence on this low maintenance block, with access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway and South Gippsland Highway
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbourne's most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Monash University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherine's Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets College and Haleybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

Description:
Luxury & Location - Fabulous Family Living
Located in the highly-sought after Tulliallan Estate and in one of the prime locations of Cranbourne North is this beautiful 4 bedroom home that is sure to impress, featuring:
- Generous master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- 3 oversized additional bedrooms all with BIR
- Large family open plan living area alongside kitchen with stone bench tops and 900mm stainless steel appliances
- Additional separate living room as you enter the house
- Plenty of storage space
- Refrigerated reverse cycle air conditioning zoned throughout the house
- Downlights
- Low maintenance front and backyard
- Double garage
- Stone bench tops
- Three phase power
Short walking distance to the Tulliallan Primary school, local medical centre, local bus stop, Alkira Secondary College, Berwick train station, Monash Freeway, Federation University, Chisholm TAFE, Casey Hospital, St Johns of God, Nossal High, parks, lakes, shopping centres, kindergartens, child care centres and all other amenities.
This fantastic opportunity won't last long. Call now to book your private inspection!

Description:
Family Gem in Selandra Rise!
UpHill Real Estate is delighted to present this well loved family home in Selandra Rise Estate (named Victorias best master-planned development 2016 UDIA Awards for Excellence), and in walking distance to St Thomas primary school, St Peters Secondary College, Wilandra Rise primary school , Clyde Shopping centre, multiple parks, childcare centres, bus-stops and Selandra rise shopping centre.
Light and bright interior comprising a master bedroom to front of the home with Walk-in robe & classy private ensuite, two more bedroom with wardrobes, a main bathroom, an open plan family & dining area perfected by well-appointed designer Kitchen which includes 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, stone benchtops and walk-in pantry. Step out through one of the two elegant wooden stacker doors to find a covered decked alfresco with spacious backyard that welcomes young explorers and all year BBQ
Your new home comes with,
- Elegant floating boards throughout
- Ceiling fan to master bedroom
- Ducted Heating & Split system cooling
- Glass splash-back in kitchen
- Five burner 900mm stainless steel cooktop and oven
- Dishwasher
- Stone Benchtops to Kitchen
- walk-in pantry
- Garage with remote control panel lift garage door with internal & external access
Your new home is located walking distance from
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Two children parks & walking tracks
- Bus stops (route 798)
- Selandra Rise Shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Medical Centre, AMCAL pharmacy, restaurants)
- Clyde shopping centre (McDonalds, Coles, Restaurants, Pharmacy, Medical centre, MyCar Auto)
- St Peters Secondary College
- St Thomas the Apostle primary school
- Waterfront
- Eclipse Childcare centre
and a short drive from
- Cranbourne East Primary School
- Cranbourne East Secondary School
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne Railway Station
- Berwick town centre
- Monash Freeway (Inbound and outbound)
- Hunt Club
- KingSwim aquatic centre
- Casey Fields
- Casey Grammar School
- Cranbourne Library
- Marnebek School
- St Catherines Catholic Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College
- Hillcrests Christian College
- Rivercrest Christian College
and many more conveniences
Would you like to flow through this beautiful home at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer? Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection

Description:
The Perfect Little Package!
(1P3660) Located in the forever growing and well sought after area of Cranbourne West, is this lovely ex-display home that offers a practical in design open plan layout, perfect for young families, and for those looking to downsize. The home is in close proximity to local primary and secondary schools, parks and shopping centre, not to mention offering easy FWY access.
Listed below are just some of this properties features;
- Quality built 3 bedroom brick veneer family home.
- Master with full ensuite and WIR.
- Bedrooms 2 and 3 with BIR's.
- Front lounge, plus an open plan family room, dining and kitchen area with high ceilings.
- Large outdoor pergola perfect for all year round entertaining.
- Large backyard for kids and the pet dog to run and play.
- All situated on a 613m2 block approx.
The property would also well lend itself to a tradesperson needing loads of storage, being that there is a large storage area running the whole length of the home on the side boundary. For more information and to discuss this property further please Call Jason Brown Direct. 0423 768 424
*Please note that under stage 4 restrictions no physical inspections are allowed and that the photos of this property were taken by the vendors.

Being only a very short walk to the local Cranbourne Park shopping centre, local schools, train station and parks, making this property position perfect
Perfect for someone looking to downsize, perfect for an investor and perfect for FHB's.
- 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick veneer home.
- Master with semi-ensuite.
- Reasonable in size family room and updated kitchen.
- Loads of off-street parking, plus a garage/workshop.

This is not one to go past! With genuine sellers and with all that this property has to offer, don't miss out on this great opportunity. For all enquiries please Call Jason Brown Direct. 0423 768 424

Description:
BRAND NEW FAMILY HOME WITH WETLANDS VIEW
Conveniently situated in a prime position of Cranbourne North, this location provides you with the convenience of essentials such as schools, shopping centre, ease of freeway access and bus stop. A stroll along the wetlands and its recreational facilities are just at your doorstep with water views!
With all 4 bedrooms upstairs as well as a retreat, this double storey designed home not only provides enough room and comfort, but is also cleverly designed to suit our common work or study from home days with built in study nooks on both floors.
With plenty of low maintenance front, side and rear yard as well as an under covered outdoor room, your home will have plenty of space to have family and friends over for entertaining!
A few extra features to note:
- 900mm appliances in kitchen with stone benchtop
- 2590mm ceilings to both floors
- Cooling and heating throughout the house
- LED downlights throughout
- Security alarm
- Rollerblinds and flyscreens to windows and doors
- Tiles to living areas and carpet to remaining
Vendor says sell, so contact Monica today 0419 651 399.
Internal area
234m²

Description:
TITLED FLAT BLOCK WITH 18 METERE FRONTAGE.
Located in the highly desirable St Germain Estate Clyde North, this outstanding block of land is titled and ready for you to bring your dream home plans and start building.
If you are looking for a larger block with big frontage this is the one. This 613sqm allotment is great opportunity to build your desired home with dimensions of 18m x 33.4m this truly offers great flexibility.
St Germain Estate is only a short drive to Berwick Village, freeway access, medical centres, supermarkets, train station and public transport. Combine this long list of shopping precincts, educational amenities and with the Berwick train station only a short drive away, it's no surprise why Clyde North has become one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs.
St Germain is located on Thompsons Road, approximately 10 minutes from the Princes Freeway (M1) and Berwick. Part of the booming south eastern corridor, it is only 45 minutes from Melbourne's CBD and 30 minutes from the beautiful coastal towns of the Mornington Peninsula.
It's time to start living your dream!
- St Catherine's Catholic College is approximately minutes' 7 drive away from the land
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately 5 minutes' drive away from the land
- Rivercrest Christian College is approximately 6 minutes' drive away from the land
- Berwick Chase Primary School is approximately 7 minutes' drive away from the land
- St Francis Xavier College Berwick Campus is approximately minutes' 7 drive away from the land
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 7 minutes' drive away from the land
- The Avenue Shopping Centre is 6 minutes' drive away from the land
- Clyde Road Reserve is approximately 5 minutes' drive away from the land
- Berwick Train Station is approximately 12 minutes' drive away from the land
(Our images and photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy of the sizes mentioned. Please contact your solicitor to get the section 32 checked)

Description:
Living Large on the Park
With 24 squares of living area, this near new, low maintenance townhouse, does not compromise on space.
As such, it would be an ideal first home, a home for a young family, or a downsize opportunity.
The townhouse is located in Cranbourne, within easy access to the South Gippsland Hwy/M1. It is situated within a very peaceful part of the suburb. There is a park directly in front of the residence, which would be ideal for residents who want to conveniently get out and unwind. However, it still has the convenience of being close to amenities such as the Amstel Club, Ranfurlie Golf Course, St Peter's College, childcare facilities and the Woolworths shopping precinct on the corner of Hall Rd & Evans Rd (due to open over the coming months).
The property boasts a unique 32m2 studio space above the garage. This space would suit a range of purposes including a fourth bedroom, dedicated work space, or retreat for teens or parents. Plumbing is already within the wall cavities of this space, meaning it could be converted into a fully self-contained area with a minimum of fuss or expense.
The town house is currently leased to an ideal tenant who has expressed the possibility of staying should an investor purchase. Also available with vacant possession.
Features include:
- 3 main bedrooms, master bedroom with full en-suite and walk in robe, bedrooms 2 & 3 with BIR's
- Huge 4th bedroom/studio or (possible teenagers retreat) above the double garage
- Impressive kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
- 5kw split system in lounge (cooling/heating)
- ducted heating throughout
- Open plan living areas leading to the rear courtyard
- Powder room and separate laundry downstairs
- Family bathroom with a large shower
- balcony to master bedroom
- double garage with rear roller door to yard
- solar hot water system
For more information about this residence please call Steve Pinirou on 0402 837 853 at Eview Group - Bayside.

Description:
Approved Plans and Permits for a 2nd Dwelling
Literally so central to everything, in a court location, this 2 bedroom home currently tenanted, has approved plans and permits to build a second dwelling at the rear, with the initial building works already commenced and underway and all the waiting for permit approvals done.
The current owner has already paid for the 2 lot subdivision, endorsed plans and the building permit, has approval from South East Water, cleared the building area, soil test, and has already installed the initial plumbing, all of this can be a time sponge, when trying to commence a building project.
The home itself has a formal lounge with a wood heater, air conditioner and timber floors, which are throughout most of the home, kitchen has gas cooking and there are two large bedrooms each with sliding robes. The tenant has been there approximately 4 years, and would like to stay.
The home is walking distance to the train station, Coles, shops, parks, schools and even McDonalds, a fantastic location.
The home is a fantastic opportunity for Builders, Developers and Investors, come see for yourself.

Address: 85 John Russell Road Cranbourne West VIC 3977
Description:
Start Your New Chapter with Dual Living & Alfresco
APPOINTMENTS TO INSPECT NOT AVAILABLE UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.
Outstanding design features combined with functional spaces bring both comfort and style to this 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home. Whether you're a first home buyer, family, downsizer or investor, it's not only the home that will impress, it's the prime location that makes this property a smart choice.
The modern kitchen sits at the heart of the home with gorgeous bench tops with breakfast bar, high-quality appliances, including dishwasher, and a sizeable pantry. An open-plan living and dining area bring warmth and cosiness to this contemporary space. While a second lounge provides an additional relaxation zone for the entire family to enjoy some quality time.
Walk though large sliding doors to the impressive decked alfresco; the ideal space for family meals, BBQs and entertaining guests year-round.
The sizeable master bedroom features a WIR and sleek en suite, including floating wooden vanity and large shower. The additional bedrooms are comfy with plush carpets, large windows and BIRs, while the shared bathroom has everything your family could need, including a bath, shower, and separate WC.
Main features include:
- Good sized block in prime location with great choice of amenities
- Spacious decked alfresco
- Dual living zones
- Four sizeable bedrooms, two elegant bathrooms
- Master bedroom with sleek en suite
- Quality carpet & tiles through the home
- Central heating and separate ducted evaporative cooling throughout.
- Easy to maintain, landscaped garden
- Double remote garage with dual access
With Barton Primary School in walking distance, as well as a choice of other schools within the area, this property's convenient location makes life that much easier. Keep the kids entertained with a choice of parks, playgrounds, and skate parks within the area. You'll also find a cluster of shops and other amenities nearby. Access Melbourne CBD via the M1 or jump on the train at Merinda or Cranbourne station for an easy commute.
Don't miss this incredible opportunity! Book an inspection to view this excellent property today.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only. ***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Location Location Location
This family home enjoys one of the best positions that Warneet has to offer, located on Rutherford parade, with a vast 1214m2 approx of land, zoned living, large shed, and room to park the boat, it won't last long.
Upon entry, you are greeted by the large open plan kitchen meals and living space with a walk-in pantry, breakfast bar, and plenty of storage. Split system heating and cooling will keep you comfortable year-round with the bonus of a wood heater.
The master bedroom positioned at the front of the home offers a walk-in robe, ensuite, and your private courtyard complete with spa. The remaining two bedrooms located to the rear of the property are serviced by a central bathroom, laundry, and large rumpus/ second living zone. The second bedroom benefits further from a walk-in robe and semi-ensuite.
Outside you will find a large undercover entertaining area, Full side access to a large shed with 3 phase power and covered parking area for a boat, trailer or caravan. With well-established low maintenance gardens including vegetable garden this home offers a fantastic lifestyle at an affordable price
Features include
• Ceiling Fans throughout
• Heating & Cooling
• Shedding
• Master with ensuite
• Spa Area
• Outdoor entertaining
• Multiple living zones
• Large yard
This property is ideally located with everything at your fingertips- General store, pier, across the road, Yacht club, to mention a few and is only a short drive to local schools and shopping centers.
This property will not last long, so contact your #coastalvillagespecialist Jason Stirling on 0411 520 173 to arrange your viewing today!

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL: Superbly situated at the rear of a quiet complex of only 3 units with ample visitor parking, this sensational prospect is located in close proximity to schools, parks and major shopping facilities. 3/44 Stawell Street is a beautifully presented 2 bedroom unit that pairs contemporary comfort with the ultimate in lifestyle convenience.
An exciting opportunity to break into the market or downsize in style, this single level residence impresses with bright open plan living and dining areas complete with low maintenance timber and tiled flooring. The modernised hostess kitchen with breakfast bar is a major selling point and boasts stainless steel appliances including a gas cooktop.
Step outside and be greeted by a generous entertainment space with room for a large outdoor setting. The private terrace garden provides a serene place to relax and unwind at the end of a hard day's work or why not fire up the barbecue on weekends and dine alfresco style!
With a long list of recent upgrades the 2 very comfortable bedrooms have built-in robes and easy access to a sleek modern bathroom with freestanding rectangular tub and separate toilet. Added extras include RC/SS air-conditioning, ceiling fans, dishwasher and a single lock up garage.
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed. Within moments to local primary/secondary schools and Chisholm TAFE together with South Gippsland Highway and Narre Warren-Cranbourne Road en route to the shopping facilities at Thompsons Parkway, Casey Central, the Hunt Club Village and Cranbourne Park shopping centre. Those that don't drive can take advantage of the public transport leading to the main street and, most importantly, the Cranbourne train station!
This is the perfect opportunity to break into the real estate market without breaking the bank ..... so don't delay!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME CLOSE TO SHOPS!
Presenting a wonderful 4 bedroom family home with 2 living areas close to Hunt Club shops, all set on a generous 569sqm block that faces north in a lovely tree lined street.
Upon entering the home, you are greeted with the large formal lounge, floating floors & tiling, with the home being freshly painted. The great sized master bedroom features an ensuite & walk in robe.
Heading through to the next zone is the light filled kitchen with updated appliances including gas cooking, oven & dishwasher, along with plenty of bench & cupboard space, all while overlooking the dining area & family room. There is ducted heating and evaporative cooling for your year round comfort.
At the rear of the home, three more bedrooms all have built in robes, while the neat family bathroom with separate toilet is nearby. With sliding cavity doors, this home is able to be zoned off to give all the family their private space.
Heading outside you have a large yet low maintenance backyard for the family or pets to enjoy, and rear roller door access from the double garage onto the spacious concreted area, perfect for entertaining or vehicle storage.
Set in the much loved Hunt Club estate within walking distance to the Hunt Club shops and close proximity to the Springhill shops, Cranbourne Centro, Cranbourne East Primary & Secondary schools, Casey Grammar, Marnebek, public transport, arterial roads and more, the location is ideal for families & investors and should be at the top of your shortlist. Call Daniel today!
Please note : Photo I.D. is required at all inspections.
COVID-19 STAGE 4 LOCKDOWN: Due to the recent stage 4 lockdown we are currently unable to host any property inspections. We do however have Virtual Tours available for most of our listings and these can be viewed on our website or through the realesate.com.au portal. We hope that you and your family are staying safe and well, and we look forward to meeting you in person after this is all over. If you have any questions or need any advice, our agents are always available to chat via phone call, facetime, email or sms. Thank you for your understanding.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to ensure the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or the agent. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.

Description:
IDEAL LOCATION IN ST GERMIAN
CLYDE NORTH
. ST Germian estate
. 482m2 with 15.8m frontage
. No easement
St Germain Estate: The perfect opportunity to build the perfect home for your family in desirable location of Clyde North. This good-sized titled block of land is 482 sqm with a 15.8 metre frontage and is ready to build on.
St Germain Estate is only a short drive to Berwick Village, freeway access, medical centres, supermarkets, train station and public transport. Combine this long list of shopping precincts, educational amenities and with the Berwick train station only a short drive away, it's no surprise why Clyde North has become one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs.
St Germain is located on Thompsons Road, approximately 10 minutes from the Princes Freeway (M1) and Berwick. Part of the booming south eastern corridor, it is only 45 minutes from Melbourne's CBD and 30 minutes from the beautiful coastal towns of the Mornington Peninsula.
It's time to start living your dream!
- St Catherine's Catholic College is approximately minutes' 7 drive away from the land
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately 5 minutes' drive away from the land
- Rivercrest Christian College is approximately 6 minutes' drive away from the land
- Berwick Chase Primary School is approximately 7 minutes' drive away from the land
- St Francis Xavier College Berwick Campus is approximately minutes' 7 drive away from the land
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 7 minutes' drive away from the land
- The Avenue Shopping Centre is 6 minutes' drive away from the land
- Clyde Road Reserve is approximately 5 minutes' drive away from the land
- Berwick Train Station is approximately 12 minutes' drive away from the land
Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, however it does not constitute any representation by the vendor, agent or agency.
